resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Tooling and the CLI here

fields.description:
It looks your server is pretty busy, I tested my Internet connection and it works pretty well, I can upload files download etc. But cant compile, after hyperloop assembly CLI throws ERROR] socket hang up

Also your website: appcelerator.com takes forever loading, chrome says: waiting for appcelerator.com.

I logout and login in appc cli but ir didn't fix it
Please help

comments.body: Hello, Check to make sure your computer and device are on the same wireless network. LiveView requires the following ports to be open: 8323 and 8324. Also, send the trace log "-l trace" by running your app in terminal/command prompt. Thanks.
It looks is a problem with my tplink router, connected my laptop to modem behind the tplink and it works again. I wonder what happen between tplink and modem.
